item.title: Beth add a quote by Isaac Asimov
item.description: "Properly read, the Bible is the most potent force for atheism ever conceived." -- Isaac Asimov

item.title: Beth add a quote by Isaac Asimov
item.description: "Creationists make it sound as though a 'theory' is something you dreamt up after being drunk all night." -- Isaac Asimov

item.title: Beth add a quote by Lois McMaster Bujold
item.description: "My home is not a place, it is people." -- Lois McMaster Bujold

item.title: Beth add a quote by Lois McMaster Bujold
item.description: "Guard your honor. Let your reputation fall where it will. And outlive the bastards." -- Lois McMaster Bujold

item.title: Beth add a quote by Dwight D. Eisenhower
item.description: "Don't join the book burners. Don't think you're going to conceal faults by concealing evidence that they ever existed. Don't be afraid to go in your library and read every book..." -- Dwight D. Eisenhower

item.title: Beth add a quote by Salman Rushdie
item.description: "What is freedom of expression? Without the freedom to offend, it ceases to exist." -- Salman Rushdie

item.title: Beth add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "All these people talk so eloquently about getting back to good old-fashioned values. Well, as an old poop I can remember back to when we had those old-fashioned values, and I say let's get back to the good old-fashioned First Amendment of the good old-fashioned Constitution of the United States -- and to hell with the censors! Give me knowledge or give me death!" -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Beth add a quote by Heinrich Heine
item.description: "Where they have burned books, they will end in burning human beings." -- Heinrich Heine

item.title: Beth add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "A human being should be able to change a diaper, plan an invasion, butcher a hog, conn a ship, design a building, write a sonnet, balance accounts, build a wall, set a bone, comfort the dying, take orders, give orders, cooperate, act alone, solve equations, analyze a new problem, pitch manure, program a computer, cook a tasty meal, fight efficiently, die gallantly. Specialization is for insects." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Beth add a quote by Claude Adrien Helvetius
item.description: "To limit the press is to insult a nation; to prohibit reading of certain books is to declare the inhabitants to be either fools or slaves: such a prohibition ought to fill them with disdain." -- Claude Adrien Helvetius

item.title: Beth add a quote by Dan Barker
item.description: "Scientists do not join hands every Sunday and sing "Yes gravity is real! I know gravity is real! I will have faith! I believe in my heart that what goes up, up, up must come down, down, down. Amen!" If they did, we would think they were pretty insecure about the concept." -- Dan Barker

item.title: Beth add a quote by Dan Barker
item.description: "Faith is a cop-out. If the only way you can accept an assertion is by faith, then you are conceding that it can't be taken on its own merits. It is intellectual bankruptcy." -- Dan Barker

item.title: Beth add a quote by Robert Heinlein
item.description: "Progress isn't made by early risers. It's made by lazy men trying to find easier ways to do something." -- Robert Heinlein
